TopicTitle: Project Pandora - Investigation of the New Kerbinsburg Nuclear Powerplant Meltdown

Articles.Content:
Prolouge

News Reporter: I am at the scene of the New Kerbinsburg Nuclear Powerplant meltdown. Just hours ago, an explosion occurred here, triggering a meltdown. New Kerbinsburg is being evacuated as I speak, and an investigation team will be sent in to figure out what happened.

Closer to the powerplant...

Jeff: Alright team, remember what our mission was?

Chadburry: We are to enter the powerplant, study the remains, and split up and explore it as well.

Jeff: Good, because I actually forgot.

Greg: What do we do incase of danger?

Jeff: Scream like a little girl, I guess.

Chadburry: Seems like it would work.

Jeff: Now, after the investigation, we will all regroup at the entrance. Put your hazmat suits on, boys! We're going in!

To be continued...
